name: Dave
message:
It would be easy to think so, one Microsoft technology only really working with another Microsoft technology, but that appears not be be the case. I did some additional reading around this before I took the plunge (not mentioned in the above post) and found a couple of interesting articles, the first is from a Google Chrome engineer and the second is from an ex-Mozilla employee. There is further evidence that ‘Antivirus Software Weakens HTTPS Security‘. Then there’s Kaspersky……..
I’m not saying that either Microsoft or Defender are perfect (that’s just crazy talk) but if we are to consider carefully what we install on our computers then I think that AV should come under the same scrutiny as a browser toolbar.
